query: Set an alarm at 4:30 PM on Thursdays for my online meeting.
I need a reminder to pick up the dry cleaning every Friday at 5 PM.

extras.EXTRA_DESCRIPTION: Reminder: Pick up dry cleaning from 5PM on Fridays

query: Set a timer for my laundry in 1 hour, ideally with no user interface popping up.
I need to time my 5-minute presentation; please set a timer and skip any UI if possible.
If I want to disable an alarm, how can I quickly find the list of all my alarms?
What alarms do I have set that remind me of daily tasks? Can I see them?
I'm looking to reach out to my family members only; how can I select them from my contacts effectively?

response.desc: Use ACTION_PICK to allow users to select specific pieces of information from contacts.

query: I need to quickly select a contact to send them an image. How can I do that?

response.desc: To get the contact id of the user, use the ACTION_PICK action.

query: I need to email my professor about a project. How can I select their email address from my contacts without scrolling too much?
What do I do if I can't recall my coworker's phone number? Can you assist me in picking it?

response.desc:
Initiating a call is a common action for phone apps.
Create an intent filter to advertise your app's ability to perform this action using the
information in the following section.
To open the phone app and dial a phone number, use the ACTION_DIAL action and specify a phone number using the following URI scheme. When the phone app opens, it displays the phone number, and the user must tap the Call button to begin the phone call.
To place a phone call directly, use the ACTION_CALL action and specify a phone number using the following URI scheme. When the phone app opens, it begins the phone call. The user doesn't need to tap the Call button.
The ACTION_CALL action requires that you add the CALL_PHONE permission to your manifest file:

query: I'd like to send a thank-you email to my hiring manager after an interview. His email is hiringmanager@example.com. How should I do this?
How can I send a farewell email to my colleagues who I worked with for years? His email is colleagues@example.com.
I need to upload a set of images from a recent trip. Is it possible to select them in bulk?
How can I select several documents at once to print later?
Can I select multiple PDF files to send via email at once?

extras.Intent.EXTRA_EMAIL: A string array of all "To" recipient email addresses.
extras.Intent.EXTRA_CC: A string array of all "CC" recipient email addresses.
extras.Intent.EXTRA_BCC: A string array of all "BCC" recipient email addresses.
extras.Intent.EXTRA_SUBJECT: A string with the email subject.
extras.Intent.EXTRA_TEXT: A string with the body of the email.
extras.Intent.EXTRA_STREAM:
A Uri pointing to the attachment.
        If using the
        ACTION_SEND_MULTIPLE
        action, this instead is an
        ArrayList containing
        multiple Uri objects.

response.desc:
Composing an email with optional attachments is a common action for email apps.
Create an intent filter to advertise your app's ability to perform this action using the
information in the following section.
To compose an email, use one of the following actions based on whether you'll include attachments or not, and include email details such as the recipient and subject using the extra keys listed.

query: I want to take notes during the meeting and save them to a specific folder. How can I do that?
Can I store some new diagrams I've made for my engineering project in a document?

extras.name: New Diagrams
extras.text: I have created some new diagrams for my engineering project.

query: I'm organizing a corporate event and need multiple taxis for guests arriving at the same time; can you facilitate this?
Can you take care of booking a taxi for my kids’ school pick up today?

response.solution: Call a taxi for your kid's school pick-up today.

query: I'd like to visit a well-known art gallery. Please show me where I can find one nearby on the map.
What are the common causes of headaches? I need to understand why I might be having them.
What are the advantages of meditation for mental health?
Help me find the parental control settings. I need to adjust what my kids can access.

response.desc: The ACTION_WIFI_SETTINGS action allows you to view or configure wireless network and Internet-related services in the System Settings app.

query: I need to troubleshoot my hotspot settings since my friends can't connect. Where do I go?

response.solution: Please try resetting your network settings or contacting your internet service provider.

query: With all this focus on data privacy, how do I quickly switch to airplane mode?

response.solution: Switching to airplane mode can often be done by swiping down from the top of your screen or pressing the power button followed by the volume up button twice. To open the Airplane Mode settings screen, you can use the ACTION_AIRPLANE_MODE_SETTINGS action.
